snippet: A visit to Coimbra, in central Portugal, yields cheap lodging, meals and music -- and plenty of history.
abstract: A visit to Coimbra, in central Portugal, yields cheap lodging, meals and music -- and plenty of history.
lead_paragraph: Visiting a college town can sure bring back memories: dorm living, late night studying, partying to excess, roaming the campus dressed like vampires.

headline.main: A Portuguese University Town, Both Familiar and Foreign
